text: Rose-Croix may refer to: * Rosy Cross, a symbol associated with Christian Rosenkreuz, founder of the Rosicrucian Order * Rosicrucianism, a spiritual and cultural movement which arose in Europe in the 17th century * Rose+Croix Journal, a publication of the Ancient Mystical Order Rosae Crucis * Salon de la Rose + Croix, a series of Symbolist art salons hosted in Paris during the 1890s * Scottish Rite, one of several Rites of Freemasonry
title: Rose-Croix
